title: Metro (British newspaper)
summary: Metro is the United Kingdom's highest-circulation print newspaper. It is published in tabloid format by DMG Media.[2] The free newspaper is distributed from Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays and the period between Christmas Eve and New Year's Day inclusive) mornings on trains and buses, and at railway/Underground stations, airports and hospitals across selected urban areas of England, Wales and Scotland. Copies are also handed out to pedestrians.
